entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:07 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -6.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 06:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -6.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -7.9°C
Wind: ENE 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle or drizzle. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle changing to periods of drizzle this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to a few flurries this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
